events.name: AfterRefreshToken
events.description:
After exchange Refresh token for an id token.
 New idToken, refreshToken are returned from Firebase.

events.name: AfterUpdate
events.description:
After Update profile.
 localId, email, displayName, photoUrl, and new idToken, refreshToken are returned from Firebase.

events.name: FirebaseAuthError
events.description: Event that return Response PayLoad for Error handler.

events.name: FirebaseAuthUserData
events.description:
After Sign up or Sign in with email and password.
 email, idToken, refreshToken, expireIn, localId are returned from Firebase.

events.name: GotUserInfo
events.description:
After GetUserInfo method.
 localId, email, displayName, photoUrl, disabled state are returned from Firebase.

events.name: OAuthCredentialData
events.description:
After Sign up or Sign in with Facebook or Google
 federatedId, localId, email, firstName, lastName, displayName, photoUrl, idToken, refreshToken, expireIn are returned from Firebase.
